speakers.title: Connectivity & Faith in the age of the Internet
speakers.name: Ben Collins
speakers.description: Ben Collins, an entrepreneur in new faith movements and Adjunct professor of Religious Studies, Stetson University has used  technology to merge platforms, cultivate meaning and challenge perceptions of religion. He'll share how, with a minuscule budget he's used tools like HootSuite, Mail Chimp, Evernote and Video platforms for communication, marketing and administrative management. He'll show how it's possible to get a polished product, connect people with a cause, and create buy in

speakers.title: UX Design and Agile development
speakers.name: Kenyon Congdon
speakers.description: Kenyon Congdon is a Senior Analyst with SunGard Public Sector in Lake Mary. He is a usability and user experience specialist and has given over 200 internal UX/UI training sessions. His work succeeds through careful understanding of the target audience and how to communicate with them in a way they not only understood but wanted to hear. Kenyon will discuss upfront UI and UX design and how it fits into an agile development environment.
